PSCT.Base: When this card is activated: You can add 1 "Scareclaw" monster or "Visas Starfrost" from your Deck to your hand. Monsters your opponent controls lose 100 ATK/DEF for each Defense Position monster on the field. If 3 or more Defense Position monsters are on the field: You can target 1 card your opponent controls; destroy it. You can only use this effect of "Primitive Planet Reichphobia" once per turn. You can only activate 1 "Primitive Planet Reichphobia" per turn.
